tagline: We are a small-medium sized contract bottler based just outside London.
description: We are a small-medium sized contract bottler based just outside London. We offer Bottling, Blending, Compounding, rectification, cask filling, cask storage, whisky blending up to 100k liters as well as sourcing bulk spirits from around the world. We offer the following spirit types Whisky, Scotch Whisky (inc single malt), Rum, Vodka, Gin, Tequila (CRT certified), liqueurs, brandy and Neutral Grain Spirit. Low MOQs (500 units). As a contract bottler we also are able to source at great rates Glass, Corks (custom design), Shrink Caps & Cardboard Transit Cases.

tagline: Anderson Cole Group is a UK-based boutique recruitment consultancy launched in late 2024.
description: Anderson Cole Group is a UK-based boutique recruitment consultancy launched in late 2024. They specialise in matching top-tier talent with forward-thinking organisations, particularly in the education, media, and FMCG sectors. With a personal, relationship-driven approach, Anderson Cole handles everything from permanent to interim and executive placements, ensuring not just a skills fit but also cultural alignment with each client’s brand. Founded and led by Tom Cole, the firm positions itself as a true extension of its clients, building long-term partnerships that go beyond mere transactions. They are already recruiting for finance and admin roles across southern England.

tagline: BOWIMI is a CRM/Sales Platform specifically for drink brands to better record, organise and act on sales data.
description: BOWIMI is a CRM/Sales Platform specifically for drink brands to better record, organise and act on sales data.  BOWIMI is a bit like merging google maps, a CRM and all your excel spreadsheets (although Iâ€™m sure our tech geniuses wouldnâ€™t be happy with me describing the platform this way). We strip out time wasting admin, making the team more productive and customer focussed. Our live dashboards allow exec teams to be able monitor performance and gain incredible actionable insights in trade activities with one simple click of a button. Manage your customers, prospects, route planning, data capture, ordering, sales performance, surveys, listing types, track sampling, ambassador activity, activations, contracts, reporting and much more, all from the palm of your hand. On average BOWIMI users gain 4 working days back a month from the efficiencies of using the platform.

tagline: Cone is a modern, cloud-based accountancy practice founded in 2015, with offices in Hampshire and London.
description: Cone is a modern, cloud-based accountancy practice founded in 2015, with offices in Hampshire and London. They specialise in supporting creative, hospitality, and e‑commerce entrepreneurs, offering more than just compliance—they partner with clients as virtual financial directors to drive real growth . Their services include: converting financial transactions into clear, actionable reports; strategic growth planning tailored to client‑specific goals; comprehensive tax, payroll, HMRC and Companies House compliance; and a fully paper‑free, mobile-friendly workflow using Xero, with subscription included . Cone emphasises transparency, freedom, creativity, and a “people-first” ethos—working remotely with clients via discovery calls, quarterly reviews, and ongoing support to help small businesses thrive .

tagline: We’re a specialist freight forwarder dedicated to supporting the drinks industry.
description: We’re a specialist freight forwarder dedicated to supporting the drinks industry.Whether you’re moving alcohol, soft drinks, bottles, packaging, raw materials, or even promotional items, we’re here to help at every stage of your supply chain.We also have our own UK movement guarantee, which means we can assist with both duty suspended and duty paid shipments. Our services cover everything from UK and cross-border transport to overnight pallets, same-day deliveries, loose casks, hazardous cargo, groupage, part and full trailer loads, consolidation, sea containers and air freight.If you’d like to know more or have any questions, please do get in touch.
